publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1075# Donald Gorrie: Local Councils on Alcohol-That the Parliament is concerned about Alcohol Focus Scotland's report, A Report on Funding, setting out the financial problems faced by many of their local councils on alcohol because of inadequate funding and believes that local health services and local authorities should ensure that their local council on alcohol is adequately funded to cope with increasing demands for its services.
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Mark Ballard*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Murray Tosh*
S2M-1075# Local Councils on Alcohol (lodged on 19 March 2004) Robert Brown*
